msIdentifier.institution: Royal Asiatic Society of Great Britain and Ireland

msItem.title: Bustan.
msItem.note: Folio one, recto: line of Devanagari script, probably the title. Final folio of text, verso: note pricing the MS at 30 rupees, the end not deciphered. Subsequent flyleaf, recto: Khan Sahib. Ruled margins. Headings in red. Panel of illumination above opening of text.

layoutDesc.p: 17 lines on a page in double column

handNote.persName: Sayyid 'Ata'allah of the alley outside the Mauji? gate in the Kanal Karan? quarter, Lahore

bindingDesc.p: English cloth and marbled board binding.

origin.p: Lahore, reign of Aurangzeb, with Zibardast Khan as Subadar. 21 Dhu 'l-Hijja A.H. 1114 (8 May 1703). (Not 1014)

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
